author: Don Beach (Ernest Raymond Beaumont-Gantt)
description: With its trio of rums at a full measure a piece, this maritime sour is one of the punchiest drinks on the classic roster of Tiki cocktails.
name: Navy Grog
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)
7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice (or 6 cubes ice)
